name: Paper Fox
description:
Español:

Paper Fox es un juego artístico en estilo Paper Art, de aventura y amistad, donde deberás ayudar a Mordin a encontrar las partes perdidas de su nave para poder volver a su planeta.

Nuestro protagonista es el adorable Mordin y deberás ayudarlo a reconstruir su nave para volver a su planeta, mientras conoces a divertidas criaturas.

English:

Paper Fox is an artistic game on paper style, it's a game related to adventure and friendship, where you'll have to help Mordin find the missing parts of his spaceship to be able to go back to his planet.

Our main character is the adorable Mordin, and you'll have to help him rebuild his ship to go back to his planet while encountering fun creatures.
